item.title: My first March Madness bracket ever... SUCKED!!!
item.description: Well, when you’re at a young age like I am in college, you have to try some things you’ve never tried before to get that experience! No, it’s not what you think I’m talking about. I’m talking about making a NCAA March Madness Tournament Bracket. What did you think I was talk- you know what never mind, that’s besides the point. Now, I’ll give out some warnings here. I have played sports since I was the young age of 4.
